sentences.sentence: Alan Turing was an English scientist, mathematician, logician, and cryptographer, and arguably the greatest British scientist of the 20th century.
sentences.translation: 阿兰·图灵是英国的一位科学家、数学家、逻辑学家和译码者，可以说是20世纪英国最伟大的科学家。

sentences.sentence: As the founder of pragmatism, firstly and mostly Peirce was a logician.
sentences.translation: 作为实用主义的鼻祖，皮尔士首先和主要是一位逻辑学家。

sentences.sentence: Stand well clear of a hypoglycemic logician when sustenance has been withheld!
sentences.translation: 当他营养得不到保障的时候最好不要出现在一位低血糖的逻辑学家面前！
